Mat 1:1 Bi,bloj gene,sewj VIhsou/ Cristou/( ui`ou/ Dabi,d( ui`ou/ VAbraa,m
Mat 1:2 VAbraa.m evge,nnhse to.n VIsaa,k\ VIsaa.k de. evge,nnhse to.n VIakw,b\ VIakw.b de. evge,nnhse to.n VIou,dan kai. tou.j avdelfou.j auvtou/\
Mat 1:3 VIou,daj de. evge,nnhse to.n Fare.j kai. to.n Zara. evk th/j Qa,mar\ Fare.j de. evge,nnhse to.n VEsrw,m\ VEsrw.m de. evge,nnhse to.n VAra,m\
Mat 1:4 VAra.m de. evge,nnhse to.n VAminada,b\ VAminada.b de. evge,nnhse to.n Naassw,n\ Naassw.n de. evge,nnhse to.n Salmw,n\
Mat 1:5 Salmw.n de. evge,nnhse to.n Boo.z evk th/j ~Raca,b\ Boo.z de. evge,nnhse to.n VWbh.d evk th/j ~Rou,q\ VWbh.d de. evge,nnhse to.n VIessai,\
Mat 1:6 VIessai. de. evge,nnhse to.n Dabi.d to.n basile,a Dabi.d de. o` basileu.j evge,nnhse to.n Solomw/nta evk th/j tou/ Ouvri,ou\
Mat 1:7 Solomw.n de. evge,nnhse to.n ~Roboa,m\ ~Roboa.m de. evge,nnhse to.n VAbia,\ VAbia. de. evge,nnhse to.n VAsa,\
Mat 1:8 VAsa. de. evge,nnhse to.n VIwsafa,t\ VIwsafa.t de. evge,nnhse to.n VIwra,m\ VIwra.m de. evge,nnhse to.n VOzi,an\
Mat 1:9 VOzi,aj de. evge,nnhse to.n VIwa,qam\ VIwa,qam de. evge,nnhse to.n :Acaz\ :Acaz de. evge,nnhse to.n VEzeki,an\
Mat 1:10 VEzeki,aj de. evge,nnhse to.n Manassh/\ Manassh/j de. evge,nnhse to.n VAmw,n\ VAmw.n de. evge,nnhse to.n VIwsi,an\
Mat 1:11 VIwsi,aj de. evge,nnhse to.n VIeconi,an kai. tou.j avdelfou.j auvtou/( evpi. th/j metoikesi,aj Babulw/noj
Mat 1:12 Meta. de. th.n metoikesi,an Babulw/noj( VIeconi,aj evge,nnhse to.n Salaqih,l\ Salaqih.l de. evge,nnhse to.n Zoroba,bel\
Mat 1:13 Zoroba,bel de. evge,nnhse to.n VAbiou,d\ VAbiou.d de. evge,nnhse to.n VEliakei,m\ VEliakei.m de. evge,nnhse to.n VAzw,r\
Mat 1:14 VAzw.r de. evge,nnhse to.n Sadw,k\ Sadw.k de. evge,nnhse to.n VAcei,m\ VAcei.m de. evge,nnhse to.n VEliou,d\
Mat 1:15 VEliou.d de. evge,nnhse to.n VElea,zar\ VElea,zar de. evge,nnhse to.n Matqa,n\ Matqa.n de. evge,nnhse to.n VIakw,b\
Mat 1:16 VIakw.b de. evge,nnhse to.n VIwsh.f to.n a;ndra Mari,aj( evx h-j evgennh,qh VIhsou/j o` lego,menoj Cristo,j
Mat 1:17 Pa/sai ou=n ai` geneai. avpo. VAbraa.m e[wj Dabi.d geneai. dekate,ssarej\ kai. avpo. Dabi.d e[wj th/j metoikesi,aj Babulw/noj geneai. dekate,ssarej\ kai. avpo. th/j metoikesi,aj Babulw/noj e[wj tou/ Cristou/ geneai. dekate,ssarej
Mat 1:18 Tou/ de. VIhsou/ Cristou/ h` ge,nnhsij ou[twj h=n mnhsteuqei,shj ga.r th/j mhtro.j auvtou/ Mari,aj tw/| VIwsh,f( pri.n h' sunelqei/n auvtou,j( eu`re,qh evn gastri. e;cousa evk Pneu,matoj ~Agi,ou
Mat 1:19 VIwsh.f de. o` avnh.r auvth/j( di,kaioj w;n( kai. mh. qe,lwn auvth.n paradeigmati,sai( evboulh,qh la,qra avpolu/sai auvth,n
Mat 1:20 tau/ta de. auvtou/ evnqumhqe,ntoj( ivdou,( a;ggeloj Kuri,ou katV o;nar evfa,nh auvtw/|( le,gwn( VIwsh,f( ui`o.j Dabi,d( mh. fobhqh/|j paralabei/n Maria.m th.n gunai/ka, sou\ to. ga.r evn auvth/| gennhqe.n evk Pneu,mato,j evstin ~Agi,ou
Mat 1:21 te,xetai de. ui`o,n( kai. kale,seij to. o;noma auvtou/ VIhsou/n\ auvto.j ga.r sw,sei to.n lao.n auvtou/ avpo. tw/n a`martiw/n auvtw/n

Mat 1:24 diegerqei.j de. o` VIwsh.f avpo. tou/ u[pnou evpoi,hsen w`j prose,taxen auvtw/| o` a;ggeloj Kuri,ou\ kai. pare,labe th.n gunai/ka auvtou/(

Mat 2:1 Tou/ de. VIhsou/ gennhqe,ntoj evn Bhqlee.m th/j VIoudai,aj( evn h`me,raij ~Hrw,dou tou/ basile,wj( ivdou,( ma,goi avpo. avnatolw/n parege,nonto eivj ~Ieroso,luma(

Mat 3:1 VEn de. tai/j h`me,raij evkei,naij paragi,netai VIwa,nnhj o` baptisth,j( khru,sswn evn th/| evrh,mw| th/j VIoudai,aj(

Mat 3:10 h;dh de. kai. h` avxi,nh pro.j th.n r`i,zan tw/n de,ndrwn kei/tai\ pa/n ou=n de,ndron mh. poiou/n karpo.n kalo.n evkko,ptetai kai. eivj pu/r ba,lletai

Luk 1:4 i[na evpignw/|j peri. w-n kathch,qhj lo,gwn th.n avsfa,leian

Luk 1:6 h=san de. di,kaioi avmfo,teroi evnw,pion tou/ Qeou/( poreuo,menoi evn pa,saij tai/j evntolai/j kai. dikaiw,masi tou/ Kuri,ou a;memptoi
Luk 1:7 kai. ouvk h=n auvtoi/j te,knon( kaqo,ti h` VElisa,bet h=n stei/ra( kai. avmfo,teroi probebhko,tej evn tai/j h`me,raij auvtw/n h=san

Luk 1:10 kai. pa/n to. plh/qoj tou/ laou/ h=n proseuco,menon e;xw th/| w[ra| tou/ qumia,matoj

Luk 2:38 kai. au[th auvth/| th/| w[ra| evpista/sa avnqwmologei/to tw/| Kuri,w|( kai. evla,lei peri. auvtou/ pa/si toi/j prosdecome,noij lu,trwsin evn ~Ierousalh,m

Luk 5:8 ivdw.n de. Si,mwn Pe,troj prose,pese toi/j go,nasi tou/ VIhsou/( le,gwn( :Exelqe avpV evmou/( o[ti avnh.r a`martwlo,j eivmi( Ku,rie

Luk 18:1 :Elege de. kai. parabolh.n auvtoi/j pro.j to. dei/n pa,ntote proseu,cesqai( kai. mh. evkkakei/n(
Luk 18:2 le,gwn( Krith,j tij h=n e;n tini po,lei( to.n Qeo.n mh. fobou,menoj( kai. a;nqrwpon mh. evntrepo,menoj\
Luk 18:3 ch,ra de. h=n evn th/| po,lei evkei,nh|( kai. h;rceto pro.j auvto,n( le,gousa( VEkdi,khso,n me avpo. tou/ avntidi,kou mou
Luk 18:4 kai. ouvk hvqe,lhsen evpi. cro,non\ meta. de. tau/ta ei=pen evn e`autw/|( Eiv kai. to.n Qeo.n ouv fobou/mai( kai. a;nqrwpon ouvk evntre,pomai\
Luk 18:5 dia, ge to. pare,cein moi ko,pon th.n ch,ran tau,thn( evkdikh,sw auvth,n( i[na mh. eivj te,loj evrcome,nh u`pwpia,zh| me
Luk 18:6 ei=pe de. o` Ku,rioj( VAkou,sate ti, o` krith.j th/j avdiki,aj le,gei
Luk 18:7 o` de. Qeo.j ouv mh. poih,sei th.n evkdi,khsin tw/n evklektw/n auvtou/ tw/n bow,ntwn pro.j auvto.n h`me,raj kai. nukto,j( kai. makroqumw/n evpV auvtoi/j
Luk 18:8 le,gw u`mi/n o[ti poih,sei th.n evkdi,khsin auvtw/n evn ta,cei plh.n o` ui`o.j tou/ avnqrw,pou evlqw.n a=ra eu`rh,sei th.n pi,stin evpi. th/j gh/j
Luk 18:9 Ei=pe de. kai. pro,j tinaj tou.j pepoiqo,taj evfV e`autoi/j o[ti eivsi. di,kaioi( kai. evxouqenou/ntaj tou.j loipou,j( th.n parabolh.n tau,thn\
Luk 18:10 :Anqrwpoi du,o avne,bhsan eivj to. i`ero.n proseu,xasqai\ o` ei-j Farisai/oj( kai. o` e[teroj telw,nhj
Luk 18:11 o` Farisai/oj staqei.j pro.j e`auto.n tau/ta proshu,ceto( ~O Qeo,j( euvcaristw/ soi o[ti ouvk eivmi. w[sper oi` loipoi. tw/n avnqrw,pwn( a[rpagej( a;dikoi( moicoi,( h' kai. w`j ou-toj o` telw,nhj
Luk 18:12 nhsteu,w di.j tou/ sabba,tou( avpodekatw/ pa,nta o[sa ktw/mai
Luk 18:13 kai. o` telw,nhj makro,qen e`stw.j ouvk h;qelen ouvde. tou.j ovfqalmou.j eivj to.n ouvrano.n evpa/rai( avllV e;tupten eivj to. sth/qoj auvtou/( le,gwn( ~O Qeo,j( i`la,sqhti, moi tw/| a`martwlw/|
Luk 18:14 le,gw u`mi/n( kate,bh ou-toj dedikaiwme,noj eivj to.n oi=kon auvtou/ h' evkei/noj\ o[ti pa/j o` u`yw/n e`auto.n tapeinwqh,setai( o` de. tapeinw/n e`auto.n u`ywqh,setai
Luk 18:15 Prose,feron de. auvtw/| kai. ta. bre,fh( i[na auvtw/n a[pthtai\ ivdo,ntej de. oi` maqhtai. evpeti,mhsan auvtoi/j
Luk 18:16 o` de. VIhsou/j proskalesa,menoj auvta. ei=pen( :Afete ta. paidi,a e;rcesqai pro,j me( kai. mh. kwlu,ete auvta,\ tw/n ga.r toiou,twn evsti.n h` basilei,a tou/ Qeou/
Luk 18:17 avmh.n le,gw u`mi/n( o]j eva.n mh. de,xhtai th.n basilei,an tou/ Qeou/ w`j paidi,on( ouv mh. eivse,lqh| eivj auvth,n
Luk 18:18 Kai. evphrw,thse, tij auvto.n a;rcwn( le,gwn( Dida,skale avgaqe,( ti, poih,saj zwh.n aivw,nion klhronomh,sw
Luk 18:19 ei=pe de. auvtw/| o` VIhsou/j( Ti, me le,geij avgaqo,n ouvdei.j avgaqo,j( eiv mh. ei-j( o` Qeo,j
Luk 18:20 ta.j evntola.j oi=daj( Mh. moiceu,sh|j( mh. foneu,sh|j( mh. kle,yh|j( mh. yeudomarturh,sh|j( ti,ma to.n pate,ra sou kai. th.n mhte,ra sou
Luk 18:21 o` de. ei=pe( Tau/ta pa,nta evfulaxa,mhn evk neo,thto,j mou
Luk 18:22 avkou,saj de. tau/ta o` VIhsou/j ei=pen auvtw/|( :Eti e[n soi lei,pei\ pa,nta o[sa e;ceij pw,lhson( kai. dia,doj ptwcoi/j( kai. e[xeij qhsauro.n evn ouvranw/|\ kai. deu/ro( avkolou,qei moi
Luk 18:23 o` de. avkou,saj tau/ta peri,lupoj evge,neto\ h=n ga.r plou,sioj sfo,dra
Luk 18:24 ivdw.n de. auvto.n o` VIhsou/j peri,lupon geno,menon ei=pe( Pw/j dusko,lwj oi` ta. crh,mata e;contej eivseleu,sontai eivj th.n basilei,an tou/ Qeou/
Luk 18:25 euvkopw,teron ga,r evsti ka,mhlon dia. trumalia/j r`afi,doj eivselqei/n( h' plou,sion eivj th.n basilei,an tou/ Qeou/ eivselqei/n
Luk 18:26 ei=pon de. oi` avkou,santej( Kai. ti,j du,natai swqh/nai
Luk 18:27 o` de. ei=pe( Ta. avdu,nata para. avnqrw,poij dunata, evsti para. tw/| Qew/|
Luk 18:28 ei=pe de. o` Pe,troj( VIdou,( h`mei/j avfh,kamen pa,nta( kai. hvkolouqh,same,n soi
Luk 18:29 o` de. ei=pen auvtoi/j( VAmh.n le,gw u`mi/n o[ti ouvdei,j evstin o]j avfh/ken oivki,an( h' gonei/j( h' avdelfou,j( h' gunai/ka( h' te,kna( e[neken th/j basilei,aj tou/ Qeou/(
Luk 18:30 o]j ouv mh. avpola,bh| pollaplasi,ona evn tw/| kairw/| tou,tw|( kai. evn tw/| aivw/ni tw/| evrcome,nw| zwh.n aivw,nion
Luk 18:31 Paralabw.n de. tou.j dw,deka( ei=pe pro.j auvtou,j( VIdou,( avnabai,nomen eivj ~Ieroso,luma( kai. telesqh,setai pa,nta ta. gegramme,na dia. tw/n profhtw/n tw/| ui`w/| tou/ avnqrw,pou
Luk 18:32 paradoqh,setai ga.r toi/j e;qnesi( kai. evmpaicqh,setai( kai. u`brisqh,setai( kai. evmptusqh,setai(
Luk 18:33 kai. mastigw,santej avpoktenou/sin auvto,n\ kai. th/| h`me,ra| th/| tri,th| avnasth,setai
Luk 18:34 kai. auvtoi. ouvde.n tou,twn sunh/kan( kai. h=n to. r`h/ma tou/to kekrumme,non avpV auvtw/n( kai. ouvk evgi,nwskon ta. lego,mena
Luk 18:35 VEge,neto de. evn tw/| evggi,zein auvto.n eivj VIericw,( tuflo,j tij evka,qhto para. th.n o`do.n prosaitw/n\
Luk 18:36 avkou,saj de. o;clou diaporeuome,nou( evpunqa,neto ti, ei;h tou/to
Luk 18:37 avph,ggeilan de. auvtw/| o[ti VIhsou/j o` Nazwrai/oj pare,rcetai
Luk 18:38 kai. evbo,hse( le,gwn( VIhsou/( ui`e. Dabi,d( evle,hso,n me
Luk 18:39 kai. oi` proa,gontej evpeti,mwn auvtw/| i[na siwph,sh|\ auvto.j de. pollw/| ma/llon e;krazen( Ui`e. Dabi,d( evle,hso,n me
Luk 18:40 staqei.j de. o` VIhsou/j evke,leusen auvto.n avcqh/nai pro.j auvto,n\ evggi,santoj de. auvtou/ evphrw,thsen auvto,n(
Luk 18:41 le,gwn( Ti, soi qe,leij poih,sw o` de. ei=pe( Ku,rie( i[na avnable,yw
Luk 18:42 kai. o` VIhsou/j ei=pen auvtw/|( VAna,bleyon\ h` pi,stij sou se,swke, se
Luk 18:43 kai. paracrh/ma avne,bleye( kai. hvkolou,qei auvtw/|( doxa,zwn to.n Qeo,n\ kai. pa/j o` lao.j ivdw.n e;dwken ai=non tw/| Qew/|
Luk 19:1 Kai. eivselqw.n dih,rceto th.n VIericw,
Luk 19:2 kai. ivdou,( avnh.r ovno,mati kalou,menoj Zakcai/oj( kai. auvto.j h=n avrcitelw,nhj( kai. ou-toj h=n plou,sioj
Luk 19:3 kai. evzh,tei ivdei/n to.n VIhsou/n ti,j evsti( kai. ouvk hvdu,nato avpo. tou/ o;clou( o[ti th/| h`liki,a| mikro.j h=n
Luk 19:4 kai. prodramw.n e;mprosqen avne,bh evpi. sukomwrai,an i[na i;dh| auvto,n\ o[ti diV evkei,nhj h;melle die,rcesqai
Luk 19:5 kai. w`j h=lqen evpi. to.n to,pon( avnable,yaj o` VIhsou/j ei=den auvto,n( kai. ei=pe pro.j auvto,n( Zakcai/e( speu,saj kata,bhqi\ sh,meron ga.r evn tw/| oi;kw| sou dei/ me mei/nai
Luk 19:6 kai. speu,saj kate,bh( kai. u`pede,xato auvto.n cai,rwn
Luk 19:7 kai. ivdo,ntej a[pantej diego,gguzon( le,gontej o[ti Para. a`martwlw/| avndri. eivsh/lqe katalu/sai
Luk 19:8 staqei.j de. Zakcai/oj ei=pe pro.j to.n Ku,rion( VIdou,( ta. h`mi,sh tw/n u`parco,ntwn mou( Ku,rie( di,dwmi toi/j ptwcoi/j\ kai. ei; tino,j ti evsukofa,nthsa( avpodi,dwmi tetraplou/n
Luk 19:9 ei=pe de. pro.j auvto.n o` VIhsou/j o[ti Sh,meron swthri,a tw/| oi;kw| tou,tw| evge,neto( kaqo,ti kai. auvto.j ui`o.j VAbraa,m evstin
Luk 19:10 h=lqe ga.r o` ui`o.j tou/ avnqrw,pou zhth/sai kai. sw/sai to. avpolwlo,j
Luk 19:11 VAkouo,ntwn de. auvtw/n tau/ta( prosqei.j ei=pe parabolh,n( dia. to. evggu.j auvto.n ei=nai ~Ierousalh,m( kai. dokei/n auvtou.j o[ti paracrh/ma me,llei h` basilei,a tou/ Qeou/ avnafai,nesqai
Luk 19:12 ei=pen ou=n( :Anqrwpo,j tij euvgenh.j evporeu,qh eivj cw,ran makra,n( labei/n e`autw/| basilei,an( kai. u`postre,yai
Luk 19:13 kale,saj de. de,ka dou,louj e`autou/( e;dwken auvtoi/j de,ka mna/j( kai. ei=pe pro.j auvtou,j( Pragmateu,sasqe e[wj e;rcomai
Luk 19:14 oi` de. poli/tai auvtou/ evmi,soun auvto,n( kai. avpe,steilan presbei,an ovpi,sw auvtou/( le,gontej( Ouv qe,lomen tou/ton basileu/sai evfV h`ma/j
Luk 19:15 kai. evge,neto evn tw/| evpanelqei/n auvto.n labo,nta th.n basilei,an( kai. ei=pe fwnhqh/nai auvtw/| tou.j dou,louj tou,touj( oi-j e;dwke to. avrgu,rion( i[na gnw/| ti,j ti, diepragmateu,sato
Luk 19:16 parege,neto de. o` prw/toj( le,gwn( Ku,rie( h` mna/ sou proseirga,sato de,ka mna/j
Luk 19:17 kai. ei=pen auvtw/|( Eu=( avgaqe. dou/le\ o[ti evn evlaci,stw| pisto.j evge,nou( i;sqi evxousi,an e;cwn evpa,nw de,ka po,lewn
Luk 19:18 kai. h=lqen o` deu,teroj( le,gwn( Ku,rie( h` mna/ sou/ evpoi,hse pe,nte mna/j
Luk 19:19 ei=pe de. kai. tou,tw|( Kai. su. gi,nou evpa,nw pe,nte po,lewn
Luk 19:20 kai. e[teroj h=lqe( le,gwn( Ku,rie( ivdou,( h` mna/ sou( h]n ei=con avpokeime,nhn evn soudari,w|\
Luk 19:21 evfobou,mhn ga,r se( o[ti a;nqrwpoj auvsthro.j ei=\ ai;reij o] ouvk e;qhkaj( kai. qeri,zeij o] ouvk e;speiraj
Luk 19:22 le,gei de. auvtw/|( VEk tou/ sto,mato,j sou krinw/ se( ponhre. dou/le h;|deij o[ti evgw. a;nqrwpoj auvsthro,j eivmi( ai;rwn o] ouvk e;qhka( kai. qeri,zwn o] ouvk e;speira\
Luk 19:23 kai. diati, ouvk e;dwkaj to. avrgu,rio,n mou evpi. th.n tra,pezan( kai. evgw. evlqw.n su.n to,kw| a'n e;praxa auvto,

Luk 19:25 kai. ei=pon auvtw/|( Ku,rie( e;cei de,ka mna/j

Luk 19:27 plh.n tou.j evcqrou,j mou evkei,nouj( tou.j mh. qelh,santa,j me basileu/sai evpV auvtou,j( avga,gete w-de( kai. katasfa,xate e;mprosqe,n mou

Luk 19:30 eivpw,n( ~Upa,gete eivj th.n kate,nanti kw,mhn\ evn h-| eivsporeuo,menoi eu`rh,sete pw/lon dedeme,non( evfV o]n ouvdei.j pw,pote avnqrw,pwn evka,qise\ lu,santej auvto.n avga,gete
Luk 19:31 kai. eva,n tij u`ma/j evrwta/|( Diati, lu,ete ou[twj evrei/te auvtw/| o[ti ~O Ku,rioj auvtou/ crei,an e;cei

Luk 19:40 kai. avpokriqei.j ei=pen auvtoi/j( Le,gw u`mi/n o[ti( eva.n ou-toi siwph,swsin( oi` li,qoi kekra,xontai

Luk 19:43 o[ti h[xousin h`me,rai evpi. se,( kai. peribalou/sin oi` evcqroi, sou ca,raka, soi( kai. perikuklw,sousi, se( kai. sune,xousi, se pa,ntoqen(

Luk 19:47 Kai. h=n dida,skwn to. kaqV h`me,ran evn tw/| i`erw/|\ oi` de. avrcierei/j kai. oi` grammatei/j evzh,toun auvto.n avpole,sai( kai. oi` prw/toi tou/ laou/\
Luk 19:48 kai. ouvc eu[riskon to. ti, poih,swsin( o` lao.j ga.r a[paj evxekre,mato auvtou/ avkou,wn
Luk 20:1 Kai. evge,neto evn mia/| tw/n h`merw/n evkei,nwn( dida,skontoj auvtou/ to.n lao.n evn tw/| i`erw/| kai. euvaggelizome,nou( evpe,sthsan oi` avrcierei/j( kai. oi` grammatei/j su.n toi/j presbute,roij(
Luk 20:2 kai. ei=pon pro.j auvto,n( le,gontej( Eivpe. h`mi/n( evn poi,a| evxousi,a| tau/ta poiei/j( h' ti,j evstin o` dou,j soi th.n evxousi,an tau,thn
Luk 20:3 avpokriqei.j de. ei=pe pro.j auvtou,j( VErwth,sw u`ma/j kavgw. e[na lo,gon( kai. ei;pate, moi\
Luk 20:4 To. ba,ptisma VIwa,nnou evx ouvranou/ h=n( h' evx avnqrw,pwn
Luk 20:5 oi` de. sunelogi,santo pro.j e`autou,j( le,gontej o[ti VEa.n ei;pwmen( VEx ouvranou/( evrei/( Diati, ou=n ouvk evpisteu,sate auvtw/|
Luk 20:6 eva.n de. ei;pwmen( VEx avnqrw,pwn( pa/j o` lao.j kataliqa,sei h`ma/j\ pepeisme,noj ga,r evstin VIwa,nnhn profh,thn ei=nai
Luk 20:7 kai. avpekri,qhsan mh. eivde,nai po,qen
Luk 20:8 kai. o` VIhsou/j ei=pen auvtoi/j( Ouvde. evgw. le,gw u`mi/n evn poi,a| evxousi,a| tau/ta poiw/
Luk 20:9 :Hrxato de. pro.j to.n lao.n le,gein th.n parabolh.n tau,thn\ :Anqrwpo,j tij evfu,teusen avmpelw/na( kai. evxe,doto auvto.n gewrgoi/j( kai. avpedh,mhse cro,nouj i`kanou,j\
Luk 20:10 kai. evn kairw/| avpe,steile pro.j tou.j gewrgou.j dou/lon( i[na avpo. tou/ karpou/ tou/ avmpelw/noj dw/sin auvtw/|\ oi` de. gewrgoi. dei,rantej auvto.n evxape,steilan keno,n
Luk 20:11 kai. prose,qeto pe,myai e[teron dou/lon\ oi` de. kavkei/non dei,rantej kai. avtima,santej( evxape,steilan keno,n
Luk 20:12 kai. prose,qeto pe,myai tri,ton\ oi` de. kai. tou/ton traumati,santej evxe,balon
Luk 20:13 ei=pe de. o` ku,rioj tou/ avmpelw/noj( Ti, poih,sw pe,myw to.n ui`o,n mou to.n avgaphto,n\ i;swj tou/ton ivdo,ntej evntraph,sontai
Luk 20:14 ivdo,ntej de. auvto.n oi` gewrgoi. dielogi,zonto pro.j e`autou,j( le,gontej( Ou-to,j evstin o` klhrono,moj\ deu/te( avpoktei,nwmen auvto,n( i[na h`mw/n ge,nhtai h` klhronomi,a
Luk 20:15 kai. evkbalo,ntej auvto.n e;xw tou/ avmpelw/noj( avpe,kteinan ti, ou=n poih,sei auvtoi/j o` ku,rioj tou/ avmpelw/noj
Luk 20:16 evleu,setai kai. avpole,sei tou.j gewrgou.j tou,touj( kai. dw,sei to.n avmpelw/na a;lloij avkou,santej de. ei=pon( Mh. ge,noito
Luk 20:17 o` de. evmble,yaj auvtoi/j ei=pe( Ti, ou=n evsti to. gegramme,non tou/to( Li,qon o]n avpedoki,masan oi` oivkodomou/ntej( ou-toj evgenh,qh eivj kefalh.n gwni,aj
Luk 20:18 pa/j o` pesw.n evpV evkei/non to.n li,qon sunqlasqh,setai\ evfV o]n dV a'n pe,sh|( likmh,sei auvto,n
Luk 20:19 Kai. evzh,thsan oi` avrcierei/j kai. oi` grammatei/j evpibalei/n evpV auvto.n ta.j cei/raj evn auvth/| th/| w[ra|( kai. evfobh,qhsan to.n lao,n\ e;gnwsan ga.r o[ti pro.j auvtou.j th.n parabolh.n tau,thn ei=pe
Luk 20:20 kai. parathrh,santej avpe,steilan evgkaqe,touj( u`pokrinome,nouj e`autou.j dikai,ouj ei=nai( i[na evpila,bwntai auvtou/ lo,gou( eivj to. paradou/nai auvto.n th/| avrch/| kai. th/| evxousi,a| tou/ h`gemo,noj

Joh 11:31 oi` ou=n VIoudai/oi oi` o;ntej metV auvth/j evn th/| oivki,a| kai. paramuqou,menoi auvth,n( ivdo,ntej th.n Mari,an o[ti tace,wj avne,sth kai. evxh/lqen( hvkolou,qhsan auvth/|( le,gontej o[ti u`pa,gei eivj to. mnhmei/on( i[na klau,sh| evkei/

1Co 4:2 o] de. loipo,n( zhtei/tai evn toi/j oivkono,moij( i[na pisto,j tij eu`reqh/|
1Co 4:3 evmoi. de. eivj evla,cisto,n evstin i[na u`fV u`mw/n avnakriqw/( h' u`po. avnqrwpi,nhj h`me,raj\ avllV ouvde. evmauto.n avnakri,nw
1Co 4:4 ouvde.n ga.r evmautw/| su,noida( avllV ouvk evn tou,tw| dedikai,wmai\ o` de. avnakri,nwn me Ku,rio,j evstin
1Co 4:5 w[ste mh. pro. kairou/ ti kri,nete( e[wj a'n e;lqh| o` Ku,rioj( o]j kai. fwti,sei ta. krupta. tou/ sko,touj( kai. fanerw,sei ta.j boula.j tw/n kardiw/n\ kai. to,te o` e;painoj genh,setai e`ka,stw| avpo. tou/ Qeou/
1Co 4:6 Tau/ta de,( avdelfoi,( meteschma,tisa eivj evmauto.n kai. VApollw. diV u`ma/j( i[na evn h`mi/n ma,qhte to. mh. u`pe.r o] ge,graptai fronei/n( i[na mh. ei-j u`pe.r tou/ e`no.j fusiou/sqe kata. tou/ e`te,rou
1Co 4:7 ti,j ga,r se diakri,nei ti, de. e;ceij o] ouvk e;labej eiv de. kai. e;labej( ti, kauca/sai w`j mh. labw,n
1Co 4:8 h;dh kekoresme,noi evste,( h;dh evplouth,sate( cwri.j h`mw/n evbasileu,sate\ kai. o;felo,n ge evbasileu,sate( i[na kai. h`mei/j u`mi/n sumbasileu,swmen
1Co 4:9 dokw/ ga.r o[ti o` Qeo.j h`ma/j tou.j avposto,louj evsca,touj avpe,deixen w`j evpiqanati,ouj\ o[ti qe,atron evgenh,qhmen tw/| ko,smw|( kai. avgge,loij( kai. avnqrw,poij
1Co 4:10 h`mei/j mwroi. dia. Cristo,n( u`mei/j de. fro,nimoi evn Cristw/|\ h`mei/j avsqenei/j( u`mei/j de. ivscuroi,\ u`mei/j e;ndoxoi( h`mei/j de. a;timoi
1Co 4:11 a;cri th/j a;rti w[raj kai. peinw/men( kai. diyw/men( kai. gumnhteu,omen( kai. kolafizo,meqa( kai. avstatou/men(
1Co 4:12 kai. kopiw/men evrgazo,menoi tai/j ivdi,aij cersi,\ loidorou,menoi euvlogou/men\ diwko,menoi avneco,meqa\
1Co 4:13 blasfhmou,menoi parakalou/men\ w`j perikaqa,rmata tou/ ko,smou evgenh,qhmen( pa,ntwn peri,yhma e[wj a;rti
1Co 4:14 Ouvk evntre,pwn u`ma/j gra,fw tau/ta( avllV w`j te,kna mou avgaphta. nouqetw/
1Co 4:15 eva.n ga.r muri,ouj paidagwgou.j e;chte evn Cristw/|( avllV ouv pollou.j pate,raj\ evn ga.r Cristw/| VIhsou/ dia. tou/ euvaggeli,ou evgw. u`ma/j evge,nnhsa
1Co 4:16 parakalw/ ou=n u`ma/j( mimhtai, mou gi,nesqe
1Co 4:17 dia. tou/to e;pemya u`mi/n Timo,qeon( o[j evsti te,knon mou avgaphto.n kai. pisto.n evn Kuri,w|( o]j u`ma/j avnamnh,sei ta.j o`dou,j mou ta.j evn Cristw/|( kaqw.j pantacou/ evn pa,sh| evkklhsi,a| dida,skw
1Co 4:18 w`j mh. evrcome,nou de, mou pro.j u`ma/j evfusiw,qhsa,n tinej
1Co 4:19 evleu,somai de. tace,wj pro.j u`ma/j( eva.n o` Ku,rioj qelh,sh|( kai. gnw,somai ouv to.n lo,gon tw/n pefusiwme,nwn( avlla. th.n du,namin

1Co 6:13 ta. brw,mata th/| koili,a|( kai. h` koili,a toi/j brw,masin\ o` de. Qeo.j kai. tau,thn kai. tau/ta katargh,sei to. de. sw/ma ouv th/| pornei,a|( avlla. tw/| Kuri,w|( kai. o` Ku,rioj tw/| sw,mati\

2Co 5:1 Oi;damen ga.r o[ti eva.n h` evpi,geioj h`mw/n oivki,a tou/ skh,nouj kataluqh/|( oivkodomh.n evk Qeou/ e;comen( oivki,an avceiropoi,hton( aivw,nion evn toi/j ouvranoi/j
2Co 5:2 kai. ga.r evn tou,tw| stena,zomen( to. oivkhth,rion h`mw/n to. evx ouvranou/ evpendu,sasqai evpipoqou/ntej\
2Co 5:3 ei; ge kai. evndusa,menoi ouv gumnoi.

Phi 3:8 avlla. menou/nge kai. h`gou/mai pa,nta zhmi,an ei=nai dia. to. u`pere,con th/j gnw,sewj Cristou/ VIhsou/ tou/ Kuri,ou mou\ diV o]n ta. pa,nta evzhmiw,qhn( kai. h`gou/mai sku,bala ei=nai( i[na Cristo.n kerdh,sw(
Phi 3:9 kai. eu`reqw/ evn auvtw/|( mh. e;cwn evmh.n dikaiosu,nhn th.n evk no,mou( avlla. th.n dia. pi,stewj Cristou/( th.n evk Qeou/ dikaiosu,nhn evpi. th/| pi,stei\
Phi 3:10 tou/ gnw/nai auvto,n( kai. th.n du,namin th/j avnasta,sewj auvtou/( kai. th.n koinwni,an tw/n paqhma,twn auvtou/( summorfou,menoj tw/| qana,tw| auvtou/(
Phi 3:11 ei; pwj katanth,sw eivj th.n evxana,stasin tw/n nekrw/n
Phi 3:12 ouvc o[ti h;dh e;labon( h' h;dh tetelei,wmai\ diw,kw de,( eiv kai. katala,bw evfV w-| kai. katelh,fqhn u`po. tou/ Cristou/ VIhsou/
Phi 3:13 avdelfoi,( evgw. evmauto.n ouv logi,zomai kateilhfe,nai\ e]n de,( ta. me.n ovpi,sw evpilanqano,menoj( toi/j de. e;mprosqen evpekteino,menoj(
Phi 3:14 kata. skopo.n diw,kw evpi. to. brabei/on th/j a;nw klh,sewj tou/ Qeou/ evn Cristw/| VIhsou/
Phi 3:15 o[soi ou=n te,leioi( tou/to fronw/men\ kai. ei; ti e`te,rwj fronei/te( kai. tou/to o` Qeo.j u`mi/n avpokalu,yei\
Phi 3:16 plh.n eivj o] evfqa,samen( tw/| auvtw/| stoicei/n kano,ni( to. auvto. fronei/n
Phi 3:17 Summimhtai, mou gi,nesqe( avdelfoi,( kai. skopei/te tou.j ou[tw peripatou/ntaj( kaqw.j e;cete tu,pon h`ma/j
Phi 3:18 polloi. ga.r peripatou/sin( ou]j polla,kij e;legon u`mi/n( nu/n de. kai. klai,wn le,gw( tou.j evcqrou.j tou/ staurou/ tou/ Cristou/\
Phi 3:19 w-n to. te,loj avpw,leia( w-n o` qeo.j h` koili,a( kai. h` do,xa evn th/| aivscu,nh| auvtw/n( oi` ta. evpi,geia fronou/ntej

Phi 3:21 o]j metaschmati,sei to. sw/ma th/j tapeinw,sewj h`mw/n( eivj to. gene,sqai auvto. su,mmorfon tw/| sw,mati th/j do,xhj auvtou/( kata. th.n evne,rgeian tou/ du,nasqai auvto.n kai. u`pota,xai e`autw/| ta. pa,nta
Phi 4:1 {Wste( avdelfoi, mou avgaphtoi. kai. evpipo,qhtoi( cara. kai. ste,fano,j mou( ou[tw sth,kete evn Kuri,w|( avgaphtoi,

Phi 4:23 ~H ca,rij tou/ Kuri,ou h`mw/n VIhsou/ Cristou/ meta. pa,ntwn u`mw/n avmh,n

Col 1:3 Euvcaristou/men tw/| Qew/| kai. patri. tou/ Kuri,ou h`mw/n VIhsou/ Cristou/( pa,ntote peri. u`mw/n proseuco,menoi(
Col 1:4 avkou,santej th.n pi,stin u`mw/n evn Cristw/| VIhsou/( kai. th.n avga,phn th.n eivj pa,ntaj tou.j a`gi,ouj(

Col 1:7 kaqw.j kai. evma,qete avpo. VEpafra/ tou/ avgaphtou/ sundou,lou h`mw/n( o[j evsti pisto.j u`pe.r u`mw/n dia,konoj tou/ Cristou/(
Col 1:8 o` kai. dhlw,saj h`mi/n th.n u`mw/n avga,phn evn Pneu,mati

Col 1:10 peripath/sai u`ma/j avxi,wj tou/ Kuri,ou eivj pa/san avre,skeian( evn panti. e;rgw| avgaqw/| karpoforou/ntej kai. auvxano,menoi eivj th.n evpi,gnwsin tou/ Qeou/\
